Ecosystems.Title: Earth (Modern Temperate Mix)
Ecosystems.Comment: A broadly habitable baseline with mixed temperate biomes, seasonal weather, and moderate resource diversity.

Ecosystems.Title: Cattle Farm
Ecosystems.Comment: Managed grasslands with shelterbelts and riparian strips; emphasizes grazing resources and calm, predictable weather.

Ecosystems.Title: Barren Moon
Ecosystems.Comment: Airless, dry, extreme radiation and temperature swings; effectively no native biota or liquid water.

Ecosystems.Title: Mediterranean Coast
Ecosystems.Comment: Hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters; shrubland/woodland mosaic with rich marine resources.

Biomes.Title: Arctic Tundra
Biomes.Comment: Permafrost, short growing season, dwarf shrubs, mosses, lichens.

Biomes.Title: Polar Desert
Biomes.Comment: Very low precipitation, cold and windy; sparse life.

Biomes.Title: Temperate Broadleaf Forest
Biomes.Comment: Deciduous canopy, fertile soils, pronounced seasons.

Biomes.Title: Temperate Conifer Forest (Redwood)
Biomes.Comment: Maritime fog, massive conifers, high biomass.

Biomes.Title: Temperate Grassland (Prairie/Steppe)
Biomes.Comment: Deep soils, grasses and forbs, fire-adapted.

Biomes.Title: Tropical Rainforest
Biomes.Comment: Warm, wet year-round; multilayered canopy, high biodiversity.

Biomes.Title: Hot Desert
Biomes.Comment: High evapotranspiration, sparse vegetation; dunes/rock pavements.

Biomes.Title: Cold Desert
Biomes.Comment: Low precipitation, cold winters; shrubs and salt flats.

Biomes.Title: Alpine
Biomes.Comment: High elevation, cold, windy; cushion plants, short season.

Biomes.Title: Peat Bog
Biomes.Comment: Waterlogged, acidic; slow decomposition, peat accumulation.

Biomes.Title: Riparian Corridor
Biomes.Comment: Linear habitats along streams/rivers; high productivity.

Animals.Title: Gray Wolf
Animals.Comment: Social canid predator; keystone effects on herbivores.

Animals.Title: White-tailed Deer
Animals.Comment: Generalist browser; populations surge with predator release.

Animals.Title: Brown Bear
Animals.Comment: Omnivore; seasonal hyperphagia; competes for salmon/berries.

Animals.Title: Moose
Animals.Comment: Large browser; relies on wetlands and riparian forage.

Animals.Title: Bison
Animals.Comment: Grazer shaping grassland structure through disturbance.

Animals.Title: Mountain Lion
Animals.Comment: Solitary apex predator of ungulates.

Animals.Title: Red Fox
Animals.Comment: Mesopredator; flexible diet; thrives at edges.

Animals.Title: Beaver
Animals.Comment: Ecosystem engineer; dams create wetlands and alter flows.

Animals.Title: Bald Eagle
Animals.Comment: Fish-focused raptor, scavenger; nests near water.

Animals.Title: Great Horned Owl
Animals.Comment: Nocturnal raptor; broad prey base.

Animals.Title: Snowshoe Hare
Animals.Comment: Prey base with cyclic dynamics in boreal systems.

Animals.Title: Wild Boar
Animals.Comment: Invasive in many regions; strong soil disturbance.

Animals.Title: Elk
Animals.Comment: Mixed feeder; seasonal migrations in montane systems.

Animals.Title: Black Bear
Animals.Comment: Omnivore; overlaps with human-edges, scavenger.

Animals.Title: Coyote
Animals.Comment: Adaptive mesopredator; fills gaps when apex predators decline.

Animals.Title: River Otter
Animals.Comment: Aquatic mustelid; indicator of clean waterways.

Animals.Title: Atlantic Salmon
Animals.Comment: Anadromous fish; nutrient transport from sea to rivers.

Animals.Title: Domestic Cattle
Animals.Comment: Managed grazer; shapes pastures and nutrient cycles.

Animals.Title: Domestic Sheep
Animals.Comment: Grazing/browsing; sensitive to predators.

Animals.Title: Domestic Goat
Animals.Comment: Browsers; utilize shrubs and steep terrain.

Resources.Title: Freshwater
Resources.Comment: Rivers, lakes, aquifers; essential for biota and agriculture.

Resources.Title: Stone Aggregate
Resources.Comment: Gravel/rock for construction and erosion control.

Resources.Title: Clay
Resources.Comment: Fine sediments for ceramics and bricks.

Resources.Title: Fertile Soil
Resources.Comment: High organic matter and nutrient availability.

Resources.Title: Wild Berries
Resources.Comment: Seasonal fruit; wildlife and human forage.

Resources.Title: Salt
Resources.Comment: Halite deposits or evaporites; preservation and diet.

Resources.Title: Wind Resource
Resources.Comment: Mean wind speeds and consistency for energy.

Resources.Title: Geothermal Brine
Resources.Comment: Subsurface heat/fluids for power or heating.

Weathers.Title: Heatwave
Weathers.Comment: Extended high temps; stress on biota.
